mapper.select:
/* com.innobiz.orange.web.ap.dao.ApTranBDao.selectApTranB */
SELECT
M.*, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM AP_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = M.STOR_RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) STOR_RESC_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = M.USER_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) USER_NM,
FROM (
SELECT
T.TRAN_ID, T.COMP_ID, T.STOR_ID, T.STOR_RESC_ID, DATE_FORMAT(T.TRAN_TGT_STRT_YMD, '%Y-%m-%d') TRAN_TGT_STRT_YMD, DATE_FORMAT(T.TRAN_TGT_END_YMD, '%Y-%m-%d') TRAN_TGT_END_YMD, T.DOC_INCL_YN, T.PAP_DOC_INCL_YN, T.DOC_TGT_CNT, T.TRX_TGT_CNT, T.PAP_TGT_CNT, DATE_FORMAT(T.TRAN_STRT_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') TRAN_STRT_DT, DATE_FORMAT(T.TRAN_END_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') TRAN_END_DT, T.TRAN_PROC_STAT_CD, T.DEFRAG_YN, T.USER_UID,
(SELECT RESC_VA FROM AP_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = T.STOR_RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) STOR_RESC_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = T.USER_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) USER_NM,
FROM AP_TRAN_B T, AP_RESC_B R
AND R.LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko') AND R.RESC_ID = T.STOR_RESC_ID AND R.RESC_VA LIKE CONCAT('%', #{schWord, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') AND T.TRAN_ID = #{tranId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.COMP_ID = #{compId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ${whereSqllet}
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ORDER BY T.TRAN_ID
LIMIT #{pageStrt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) M
mapper.update:
/* com.innobiz.orange.web.ap.dao.ApTranBDao.updateApTranB */ UPDATE AP_TRAN_B
TRAN_ID = #{tranId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMP_ID = #{compId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STOR_ID = #{storId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STOR_RESC_ID = #{storRescId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRAN_TGT_STRT_YMD = NOW(), TRAN_TGT_STRT_YMD = NULL, TRAN_TGT_STRT_YMD = STR_TO_DATE(#{tranTgtStrtYmd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),
TRAN_TGT_END_YMD = NOW(), TRAN_TGT_END_YMD = NULL, TRAN_TGT_END_YMD = STR_TO_DATE(#{tranTgtEndYmd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),
DOC_INCL_YN = #{docInclYn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAP_DOC_INCL_YN = #{papDocInclYn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOC_TGT_CNT = NULL#{docTgtCnt, jdbcType=BIGINT}, TRX_TGT_CNT = NULL#{trxTgtCnt, jdbcType=BIGINT}, PAP_TGT_CNT = NULL#{papTgtCnt, jdbcType=BIGINT},
TRAN_STRT_DT = NOW(), TRAN_STRT_DT = NULL, TRAN_STRT_DT = STR_TO_DATE(#{tranStrtDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),
TRAN_END_DT = NOW(), TRAN_END_DT = NULL, TRAN_END_DT = STR_TO_DATE(#{tranEndDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),
TRAN_PROC_STAT_CD = #{tranProcStatCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEFRAG_YN = #{defragYn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_UID = #{userUid, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AND TRAN_ID = #{tranId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ${whereSqllet}
